name: Matter of the Dreams
detailed_description:
Matter of the Dreams is a first – person shooter created exclusively for virtual reality, bringing you to the world of the bloodthirsty dead men that you usually see only in the movies. Scientists have proved that thought is material. So all the "fictional" monsters really exist in a parallel universe…
As the flap of a butterfly's wings in one part of the universe becomes a deadly whirlwind in another one. As a result of the space-time fault, dead men from dreams broke free and entered our world.
The military junta that seized the remains of the infrastructure and a knot of escaped soldiers of the special squad, sentenced to death, survived only. Refusing to carry out the order to sweep the survivors to optimize vital resources, your unit was disbanded, and you are declared the most dangerous terrorists.
United in the hardcore, you are forced to fire on all fronts. Now your only challenge is: to shoot to kill everything that moves, covering comrades while they are searching for supplies and trying to save the survivors.

Game:
Matter of the Dreams is a perfect game for fans of shooting without wasting time on "exploring the area". All you have to do is to aim well and pull the trigger.

Special for VR:
Matter of the Dreams is balanced exclusively for virtual reality.
The dynamics of the game will not leave any gamer indifferent, and crowds of dead men will not give you a second to take a breath.

Vestibular comfort:
Unlike many VR projects that have Moderate or Intense comfort status causing players to feel bad... Matter of the Dreams has a completely comfortable, intuitive and user-friendly control, which makes the game a good choice even for people with a weak vestibular system.

The best first virtual reality experience:
Professionally designed graphics will give a player the maximum sense of immersion.
Indie development allowed to keep the balance and to emphasize the individuality of this project.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: VR Headset required, 2x USB 3.0 ports
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6700K equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: VR Headset required, 2x USB 3.0 ports
